settings.title: Contact us
settings.text:
At Sound Box Store, we’re dedicated to keeping the lines of communication open with our valued customers and visitors. We invite you to contact us directly if you have sales enquires, techinical questions, concerns, or comments.

We love receiving feedback from customers regarding our range of Sound Pods / Zoom Rooms / Phone Booths.

Contacting our customer service team is fast and easy. Simply click on the live chat icon bottom right to connect with a knowledgeable memeber of our support team.

Alternatively fill in the fields below, and we will reply within 24 hours (Mon-Fri).

We look forward to hearing from you!
